title: Lab
rules:
# Enter the rules in this format:
# IN_variable set operator IN_variable set => OUT_variable set

dirt small and softness soft => wash_time very_small
dirt medium and softness ordinary => wash_time standard
dirt small and_not softness soft => wash_time small
dirt medium and softness soft => wash_time small
dirt medium and softness stiff => wash_time very_large
dirt large and softness soft => wash_time standard
